程序包的使用
org.giiwa.bean

  • 使用org.giiwa.bean的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.giiwa.bean  
    org.giiwa.dao  
    org.giiwa.dfile  
    org.giiwa.web  
  • org.giiwa.bean使用的org.giiwa.bean中的类 
    类和说明
    _Task
    The code bean, used to store special code linked with s1 and s2 fields table="gi_code"
    Access
    access token class, it's Bean and mapping to "gi_access" table, it mapping the "access" method in @Path interface.
    AccessLog
    已过时。  
    App
    The App bean, used to store appid and secret table="gi_app"
    AuthToken
    The AuthToken bean.
    Code
    The code bean, used to store special code linked with s1 and s2 fields table="gi_code"
    Counter
    The code bean, used to store special code linked with s1 and s2 fields table="gi_code"
    Data
    Load "freedom" data storage, not specify.
    Disk
    Demo bean
    Footprint 
    GLog
    Operation Log bean.
    GLog.ILog 
    IRole 
    License
    access token class, it's Bean and mapping to "gi_access" table, it mapping the "access" method in @Path interface.
    License.LICENSE 
    Menu
    Menu bean.
    Node
    The code bean, used to store special code linked with s1 and s2 fields table="gi_code"
    Repo.Entity
    entity of repo
    Response
    utility for generate a reponse packet
    Role
    Role bean.
    Role.RoleAccess 
    Roles
    group roles.
    Session
    Session of http request
    Stat
    The Class Stat is used to stat utility and persistence.
    Stat.MergeFunc 
    Stat.SIZE 
    Stat.TYPE 
    Temp
    Create Temporary file, which can be accessed by web api, please refer model("/temp")
    User
    The User Class is base user class, all the login/access controlled in giiwa was depended on the user, it contains all the user-info, and is expandable.
    User.Lock
    The Lock Class used to record login failure log, was used by webgiiwa framework.
    User.UserRole 
    UserConfig
    The code bean, used to store special code linked with s1 and s2 fields table="gi_code"
  • org.giiwa.dao使用的org.giiwa.bean中的类 
    类和说明
    Data
    Load "freedom" data storage, not specify.
  • org.giiwa.dfile使用的org.giiwa.bean中的类 
    类和说明
    Disk
    Demo bean
    Node
    The code bean, used to store special code linked with s1 and s2 fields table="gi_code"
  • org.giiwa.web使用的org.giiwa.bean中的类 
    类和说明
    License.LICENSE 
    Menu
    Menu bean.
    Repo.Entity
    entity of repo
    Roles
    group roles.
    Session
    Session of http request
    User
    The User Class is base user class, all the login/access controlled in giiwa was depended on the user, it contains all the user-info, and is expandable.
